title: Cold At Home, Warmer Abroad
itunes:title: Cold At Home, Warmer Abroad
description:
Finally, a welcome European meeting for the Prime Minister. After her Conservative party conference speech and a warning from the National Grid about potential power cuts this winter, we look back at Liz Truss' packed week. We get the view of Bloomberg government editor Ben Sills and energy reporter Will Mathis. Plus: Scott Thiel, chief fixed income strategist at BlackRock and Opinion columnist Marcus Ashworth on whether the UK's market mayhem has now passed.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Finally, a welcome European meeting for the Prime Minister. After her Conservative party conference speech and a warning from the National Grid about potential power cuts this winter, we look back at Liz Truss' packed week. We get the view of Bloomberg government editor Ben Sills and energy reporter Will Mathis. Plus: Scott Thiel, chief fixed income strategist at BlackRock and Opinion columnist Marcus Ashworth on whether the UK's market mayhem has now passed.

itunes:author: Bloomberg
